entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:23 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 5:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.7°C
Wind: N 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
